function.name: book_appointment
function.description: Books a consultation appointment in the AsylumLaw calendar. Use this after the customer has selected a time slot from check_calendar_availability. The appointment will be for an Initial Consultation regarding their asylum case.

time.description: Appointment time in HH:mm format (24-hour). Example: 14:00 for 2 PM

notes.description: Optional brief notes about the case or any special requirements
